## Main Assignment

Hi Tom,

It would take **3 weeks for 2 Engineers and 2 Product Designers** to create a refreshed demo of MMEF with 3D visualizations by leveraging Cesium.

Here is the timeline breakdown:

- Week 1: **Deploy Cesium Ion (back-end) with C3 AI Platform, iterate on UX proposal, source 3D models.**
- Week 2: Integrate Cesium JS (front-end) into existing MMEF application. Load data and convert data into formats supported by Cesium.
- Week 3: Integration, performance enhancements, styling to match C3 AI Design Language.

We recommend the MMEF team to drive this initiative since they have the most domain-specific context. Specifically we recommend:

- PM

	- David Corbett

- Product Design

	- Jae Kim
	- Jeeyoung Jung

- Solutions Engineering

	- Dinc Basar
	- Luis Fernandez the la Vara

This LoE has been validated by the Solutions Engineering, Platform Engineering, Product, and UX orgs.

We will try to accelerate the initiative, but some of the detailed activities are not parallelizable, so adding more resources might not yield faster progress.

You can **expect a status update from the team by the second week of January**.

Thanks,

Joao
